009package Corner_Detection;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.lib.ij.GenericDialogPlus;
019import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
020import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
021import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
022import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
024
025/**
026 * This plugin demonstrates the use of the Harris corner detector
027 * (see {@link HarrisCornerDetector}).
028 * It calculates the corner positions and shows them as a vector overlay
029 * on top of the source image.
030 * 
031 * @see Find_Corners_MOPS
032 * @see Find_Corners_ShiTomasi
033 * 
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2020/10/03
036 */
037public class Find_Corners_Harris implements PlugInFilter {
038
039        private static int Nmax = 0;    // number of corners to show (0 = all)
040        private static Color cornerColor = Color.green;
041
042        private ImagePlus im;
043        private HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters params;
044
045    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
046        this.im = im;
047        return DOES_ALL;
048    }
049    
050    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051        
052        params = new HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters();
053                if (!showDialog()) {
054                        return;
055                }
056                
057                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
058                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
059                
060                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
061                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
062                oly.strokeColor(cornerColor);
063                oly.strokeWidth(0.25);
064                oly.addItems(corners);
065                im.setOverlay(oly);
066                
067                // (new ImagePlus("Harris Corner Score", cd.getQ())).show();
068    }
069    
070        private boolean showDialog() {
071                // display dialog , return false if cancelled or on error.
072                GenericDialogPlus dlg = new GenericDialogPlus("Harris Corner Detector");
073                
074                dlg.addCheckbox("Apply pre-filter", params.doPreFilter);
075                dlg.addNumericField("Smoothing radius (\u03C3)", params.sigma, 3);
076                dlg.addNumericField("Sensitivity (\u03B1)", params.alpha, 3);
077                dlg.addNumericField("Corner response threshold (th)", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
078                dlg.addEnumChoice("Subpixel localization", params.maxLocatorMethod, false);
079                // -----------
080                dlg.addNumericField("Border distance", params.border, 0);
081                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
082                dlg.addNumericField("Minimum corner distance", params.dmin, 0);
083                
084                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", Nmax, 0);
085                
086                dlg.showDialog();
087                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
088                        return false;
089                
090                params.doPreFilter = dlg.getNextBoolean();
091                params.sigma = Math.max(0.5, dlg.getNextNumber());      // min 0.5
092                params.alpha = Math.max(0, dlg.getNextNumber());        // min 0
093                params.scoreThreshold = dlg.getNextNumber();
094                params.maxLocatorMethod = dlg.getNextEnumChoice(Method.class);
095                // -----------
096                params.border = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
097                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
098                params.dmin = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
099                
100                Nmax = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
101                
102                if(dlg.invalidNumber()) {
103                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input number");
104                        return false;
105                }       
106                return true;
107        }
108        
109        //-------------------------------------------------------------------
110        
111        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
112        private void listCorners(List<Corner> corners) {
113                IJ.log(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " - corners found: " + corners.size());
114                for (Corner c : corners) {
115                        IJ.log(c.toString());
116                }
117        }
118        
119        // Brightens the image ip. May not work with ShortProcessor and FloatProcessor
120        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
121        private void brighten(ImageProcessor ip) {      
122                int[] lookupTable = new int[256];
123                for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
124                        lookupTable[i] = 128 + (i / 2);
125                }
126                ip.applyTable(lookupTable); 
127        }
128
129}
